All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
A_Test_Fragment
A Test fragment to create when need to test promotional QR's
AdminFragment
A fragment representing the admin dashboard.
AEditEventFragment
A fragment for editing events in the admin dashboard.
AEditProfileFragment
A fragment for editing profiles in the admin dashboard.
AEventFragment
A fragment showing all events for administrator.
AImagesFragment
A fragment showing all images for administrator.
Announcement
A model class representing an announcement.
AProfilesFragment
A fragment showing all profiles for administrator.
AttendeeFragment
A fragment representing attendee dashboard, including attendee actions such as scanning QR codes and examining the signed up events.
Attendees
A model class representing attendees (who checked in) of an event.
CEventCQRFragment
Fragment for creating event check-in QR codes.
CEventDetailFragment
A fragment for adding event details.
CEventImageFragment
A fragment for selecting an image for event as poster.
CEventPreviewFragment
A fragment for previewing event before creation.
CEventSuccessFragment
A fragment displayed upon successful creation of an event.
CQRFragment
A fragment displayed check-in QR code for an event.
Database
The database class is responsible for managing/connecting Firestore database and Firebase storage instances.
DeleteItemFragment
A dialog fragment for confirming deletion.
DeleteItemFragment.ConfirmationDialogListener
Interface for handling dialog button clicks.
EditProfileFragment
A fragment for editing profile information including profile picture, name, contact info and homepage.
Event
A model class representing an event.
EventAdapter
An adapter class for managing Event items in RecyclerView.
EventAdapter.OnItemClickListener
 
EventController
Controller class for managing Event data in Firestore database.
EventInfoFragment
Event Info fragment shows the event details and has a button for signing up to an event uses who scan a QR code a directed here as well as users who click on an event in event lobby
EventLobbyFragment
A fragment for displaying a list of possible events for users in the lobby.
EventManagementFragment
A fragment for managing a specified event, including displaying QR codes, milestones, announcements, check-in map, attendance and users who signed up.
EventViewHolder
ViewHolder class for managing Event items in a RecyclerView.
ID
A model class for managing unique device IDs associated with the application.
ImageAdapter
An adapter class for managing image items in a RecyclerView.
ImageController
Controller class for managing Image data in Firestore database.
ImageController.FileListCallback
Interface for people to make sure they implement callBacks
ImageUploader
A class responsible for uploading images to Firebase Storage.
ImageViewHolder
ViewHolder class for managing image items in a RecyclerView.
MainActivity
Class representing MainActivity
Notification
A mode class that represents a notification with details such as time, sender, and description.
OrganizerFragment
A fragment representing organizer dashboard, including organizer actions such as creating events and examining the past created events.
PQRFragment
A fragment displayed promotion QR code for an event.
Profile
A model class that represents a user profile with details such as username, email, phone number, etc.
ProfileAdapter
An adapter class for managing profiles in a RecyclerView.
ProfileController
Controller class for managing Profile data in database.
ProfileViewHolder
ViewHolder class for managing profile items in a RecyclerView.
QRCodeGenerator
A class for generating QR codes (both promotion and check-in) from event IDs.
QRScanAdapter
An adapter class for managing QR code scan results.
ScanQRFragment
ScanQRFragment
SignUp
Represents signup sub-collection
StartUpFragment
Fragment represents startup screen
